item.title: AliExpress 11-11 sales
item.description: AliExpress 11-11 sales are coming up. Make sure you catch the big sales!

item.title: Migrating from HDD to SSD
item.description: Cloning my HDD with Windows 10 to a SSD to increase performance.

item.title: Upgrade your SSH keys (to Ed25519)
item.description: If you’re still using SSH RSA keys with a short key length, it’s time to upgrade to Ed25519

item.title: Installing Folding@home to fight COVID-19
item.description: I installed Folding@home (FAH) on a Debian container in Proxmox to help fight against COVID-19 (new Corona virus)

item.title: Migrating from Wordpress to Hugo
item.description: I decided to move away from Wordpress.com and migrate to Hugo. A small write-up of my experience.

item.title: Challenge write-ups
item.description: Write-ups for challenges which aren’t yet archived or aren’t open for write-ups, will be password protected with the challenge or root flag.
